item.description:
Well, we celebrated the holidays in December with a giant wine tasting bash to ring out 2010 for auld lang syne. Now it would be good to greet baby New Year and ring in 2011 having a great time with friends over some interesting new wines at Ralph's house in Cheshire, CT.

For wine night, everyone will bring a bottle of wine (no boxed wine or 1.75MLs please) AND a pot luck dish, finger food, hors d'oeuvres or desert. Please indicate what food item
you want to bring when you sign up. If you are coming by yourself or don't want to go in with someone just bring a bottle of wine that is $15 or more ( 750 ml) with your dish. Couples or groups can go in together on a bottle that is $30 or more depending on the quantity of people in the group, to ensure we have a good assortment of wines to taste. Get some different types of wine so we have a varied taste testing.
Reds - Malbec, Blends, cab, merlot, shiraz pinot noir.
Whites - sav blanc, chards, reisling, pinot grigio, etc

Please ensure you show up if you RSVP yes, since we may have a waiting list and you are taking up a persons spot if you do not show up. If you must cancel, the earlier the better if there is a waiting list.
*Please note* The address will be sent a few days prior to the event if you don't have it already to all the "yes" RSVPs, due to this being a private residence. It should go without saying to Drink Responsibly. I will have water and coffee too.
This is for 3 meetup groups to keep the volume of people down from last time. Only sign up on one site if you belong to more than one for an accurate count.
Enjoy the night in fun, style and class. * Private people parings MUST be taken off site!

**As always this is a multi group meetup and a BYOWG...bring your own wine glass!!

This event if from 6pm - 10pm.
..

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: First Wine night of 2011!
